Method Detail

setDefaultMessageClass

public static void setDefaultMessageClass(String className)
Set the default class to be used for creating messages. This overwrites the value set in the System-Properties.

Parameters:
className - the full qualified name of the class that implements the ISysMessage-interface.
See Also:
ISysGlobal

setDefaultMessageClass

public static void setDefaultMessageClass(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                   throws CSysConfigException
Set the default class to be used for creating messages. This overwrites the value set in the System-Properties.

Parameters:
configItem - the ISysConfigItem having an Class-item included, specifying the class that implements the ISysMessage-interface.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the configuration is wrong
See Also:
ISysGlobal

createMessage

public static ISysMessage createMessage()
                                 throws CSysMessageException
Create a new message using the default message implementation.

Returns:
an empty message.
Throws:
CSysMessageException - if the creation fails
See Also:
setDefaultMessageClass(java.lang.String)

createMessage

public static ISysMessage createMessage(String s)
                                 throws CSysMessageException
Create a new message using the default message implementation. The specified String becomes the content of the message.

Parameters:
s - the String to be parsed.
Returns:
the message including the items from the parsed string.
Throws:
CSysMessageException - if the creation fails
See Also:
setDefaultMessageClass(java.lang.String)

createMessage

public static ISysMessage createMessage(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                 throws ASysException
Create a new message using the message implementation from the config item. The default message class won't be overridden!

Parameters:
configItem - the ISysConfigItem having an Class-item included, specifying the class that implements the ISysMessage-interface.
Returns:
an empy message.
Throws:
ASysException - if the creation fails

createMessage

public static ISysMessage createMessage(ISysConfigItem configItem,
                                        String s)
                                 throws ASysException
Create a new message using the message implementation from the config item. The default message class won't be overridden!

Parameters:
configItem - the ISysConfigItem having an Class-item included, specifying the class that implements the ISysMessage-interface.
s - the String to be parsed.
Returns:
the message including the items from the parsed string.
Throws:
ASysException - if the creation fails

createMessageItem

public static ISysMessageItem createMessageItem(Object key,
                                                Object value)
                                         throws CSysMessageException
Creates a new message item using the default value for the message implementation.

Parameters:
key - the key of the ISysMessageItem
value - the value of the ISysMessageItem
Returns:
the created message item
Throws:
CSysMessageException - thrown if type and value doesn't match. (value can't be cast to type)

createMessageItem

public static ISysMessageItem createMessageItem(Object key,
                                                Object value,
                                                int type)
                                         throws CSysMessageException
Creates a new message item using the default value for the message implementation.

Parameters:
key - the key of the ISysMessageItem
value - the value of the ISysMessageItem
type - the type (defined in ISysMessageItem) of the ISysMessageItem
Returns:
the created message item
Throws:
CSysMessageException - thrown if type and value doesn't match. (value can't be cast to type)

createRenderer

public static ISysMessageRenderer createRenderer(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                          throws ASysException
Creates a renderer using the renderer implementation from the config item. If the specified renderer has previously been created, this renderer is returned again, because renderers can be re-used again and again.

Parameters:
configItem - the ISysConfigItem having an ISysMessageRenderer-item included, specifying the class that implements the ISysMessageRenderer-interface.
Returns:
the ISysMessageRenderer
Throws:
ASysException - if the creation fails
